de.ur.iw.navigame.utility

Class FileDownload

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ur.iw.navigame.utility.FileDownload

  • public class FileDownload
extends java.lang.Object
    Enables downloading files to this server (has nothing to do with the client - Tomcat takes care of client/server communication itself)

    • Method Detail

      • download

        public void download(java.lang.String webAddress,
                     J7Consumer<java.lang.String> onSuccess,
                     J7Consumer<java.lang.Void> onFail)
        Downloads a file to a String. Uses UTF-8 encoding (see download(String, J7Consumer, J7Consumer, String) if you want to specify another encoding);
        Parameters:
        webAddress - url of the file to download
        onSuccess - callback when the download is complete
        onFail - callback when there is an error

      • download

        public void download(java.lang.String webAddress,
                     J7Consumer<java.lang.String> onSuccess,
                     J7Consumer<java.lang.Void> onFail,
                     java.lang.String encoding)
        Downloads a file to a String.
        Parameters:
        webAddress - url of the file to download
        onSuccess - callback when the download is complete
        onFail - callback when there is an error
        encoding - Character encoding

      • downloadImage

        public void downloadImage(java.lang.String webAddress,
                          J7Consumer<byte[]> onSuccess,
                          J7Consumer<java.lang.Void> onFail)
        Downloads an file to a byte-array. Strings don't work for this, so the download(String, J7Consumer, J7Consumer)-method does not work (unless for .svg-files).
        Parameters:
        webAddress - url of the file to download
        onSuccess - callback when the download is complete
        onFail - callback when there is an error

      • readLines

        private java.lang.StringBuilder readLines(java.io.BufferedReader br)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the lines in the BufferedReader into a StringBuilder, concatenated by '\n'.
        Parameters:
        br - Reader from which lines will be read.
        Returns:
        a StringBuilder containing all the lines in the BufferedReader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getUrlConnection

        private java.net.URLConnection getUrlConnection(java.lang.String webAddress)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a URLConnection for a web address.
        Parameters:
        webAddress - URL String for which to open the address.
        Returns:
        Open & Connected URL Connection (unless an exception is raised).
        Throws:
